TITLE: 'Big Short' investor Steve Eisman worries 'everybody is coming into the year feeling too good,' sees room for disappointment
SUMMARY: Steve Eisman of Neuberger Berman sees little tolerance for things going wrong. He warns the Federal Reserve will likely cut rates fewer times than expected.

TITLE: Cliff Asness' AQR Absolute Return fund gains 18.5% in 2023, boosted by value picks
SUMMARY: Cliff Asness' longest running multistrategy fund at AQR Capital Management returned 18.5% last year, net of fees.

TITLE: Ken Griffin’s hedge fund Citadel posts double-digit returns in 2023, but lags the S&P 500
SUMMARY: Billionaire investor Ken Griffin's various hedge fund strategists all posted double-digit returns for 2023, but they failed to beat the broader market.

TITLE: How ValueAct may bring an amicable approach to help boost margins at this Japanese medical device company
SUMMARY: ValueAct Capital has a stake in Nihon Kohden. The firm's approach with Olympus and JSR may give an indication of how ValueAct will move forward from here.

TITLE: Top Wall Street analysts prefer these 3 stocks for long-term growth
SUMMARY: TipRanks' analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, including Nike and Micron.

TITLE: People may eat more calories after stopping weight loss drugs, according to Deutsche Bank survey
SUMMARY: Ozempic and Wegovy have been cheered for helping people shed unwanted pounds, but the findings of a recent poll underscore the challenges patients face.

TITLE: The spot bitcoin ETF: Here's what happens when it starts trading
SUMMARY: With a spot bitcoin ETF now looking very real, attention is turning to the details.

TITLE: One place you won't find a bitcoin ETF: Jack Bogle's Vanguard
SUMMARY: Vanguard said it will not launch a bitcoin ETF, even as its chief rival BlackRock debuted a fund on Thursday.

TITLE: What will it cost you to buy a bitcoin ETF? Here are the cheapest and most expensive funds
SUMMARY: Asset managers were already cutting their fees ahead of Thursday's launches for bitcoin ETFs.

TITLE: SEC chair gives in to a bitcoin ETF, but the hostility against cryptocurrency is still there
SUMMARY: The SEC has paved the way for the launch of spot bitcoin ETFs, but Chair Gary Gensler isn't a fan of crypto.

TITLE: SEC approves rule changes that pave the way for bitcoin ETFs
SUMMARY: Funds could launch as soon as this week from issuers such as BlackRock and Fidelity.

TITLE: Bitcoin ETFs have a key difference from their stock fund counterparts
SUMMARY: There is some concern that using the cash-only redemption model could make the plumbing of the ETFs less efficient.

TITLE: Activist Elliott spots an opportunity to restore growth at Match. Here’s what may happen next
SUMMARY: Match Group is a leader in online dating apps, but the stock’s performance has been lackluster.

TITLE: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these stocks for dividend-oriented investors
SUMMARY: TipRanks' analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, including Civitas Resources and Williams Companies.

TITLE: Four predictions for 2024: Brian Sullivan's outlook for the new year
SUMMARY: Coming off a wonderfully surprising stock market global boom of 2023, this year could be anybody's guess.
